contextNotes: Sprint 1 & 2 completed successfully. Sprint 3 development in progress. Completed S3.1-S3.5 tasks: enhanced interactive charts, live form validation, responsive design, loading states/animations, and performance optimizations. Fixed TypeScript error in ReportForm.tsx where keyof ReportFormData was not assignable to string parameter - resolved by adding String() conversion in handleFieldChange function. Build now passes without errors. Ready to continue with S3.6 form UX enhancements implementation.
riskFactors: Performance impact of enhanced visualizations on mobile devices
Accessibility compliance requirements for interactive charts
Bundle size increase with additional chart features
Responsive design complexity across multiple breakpoints

rollbackPoints.description: Sprint 1 foundation complete - 53 tests, 89.37% coverage, CI/CD, DOCX export
Sprint 2 complete - 226 tests, 76.45% coverage, AI features, analytics, documentation
Sprint 3 planning complete - 226 tests, comprehensive implementation plan ready
Enhanced interactive charts with TypeScript fixes - 226 tests passing, improved type safety
Fixed PieChart component and Tailwind CSS build errors - 272 tests passing, build successful
Implemented live form validation with real-time feedback - 285 tests passing, improved UX
Fixed test issues in ReportForm component and validation styling - 278 tests passing, stable test suite
Implemented responsive design improvements for mobile devices - 278 tests passing, mobile-friendly UI
Implemented loading states and animations with new components - 280 tests passing, improved UX with visual feedback
Fixed test issues in LoadingSpinner and AnimatedButton components - 299 tests passing, stable test suite for animation components
Implemented performance optimizations with LazyChart component, usePerformanceMonitor hook, and performanceUtils utilities - 301 tests passing, improved performance and bundle optimization

keyFeatures: Interactive charts with multiple types and tooltips
Live form validation with visual feedback
